original_text: Joseph called his second son Ephraim. Joseph said, ‘God has given children to me in the land where I have received pain.’
korean_text: 차남의 이름을 에브라임이라 하였으니 하나님이 나를 내가 수고한 땅에서 번성하게 하셨다 함이었더라

sentences.original_text: Joseph called his second son Ephraim
sentences.korean_translation: 요셉은 그의 둘째 아들을 에브라임이라 불렀습니다

sentences.original_text: God has given children to me
in the land where I have received pain
